Title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
Writer: Ben Barzman (screenplay), Basilio Franchina (screenplay), Philip Yordan (screenplay)
Actors: Sophia Loren, Stephen Boyd, Alec Guinness, James Mason
Plot: The death of Marcus Aurelius leads to a succession crisis, in which the deceased emperor's son, Commodus, demonstrates that he is unwilling to let anything undermine his claim to the Roman Empire.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
